title.narrative: Humanitarian Capacity Development and Response Project

description.narrative: Yemen is facing a chronic humanitarian crisis. This is exacerbated by recurring conflict and displacement, water scarcity, soaring food prices and high rates of malnutrition and disease. Given the political and economic instability in country, humanitarian assistance is going to be required in Yemen for the foreseeable future. The scale of need exceeds the capacity of the government, and to some extent the humanitarian community, to respond. This project is therefore being developed to provide further support and development to in country structures for effective humanitarian preparedness and response.
